quotes.text: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only source of knowledge is experience.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The value of a man should be seen in what he gives and not in what he is able to receive.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There are two ways to live: you can live as if nothing is a miracle; you can live as if everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If you are out to describe the truth, leave elegance to the tailor.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nationalism is an infantile disease. It is the measles of mankind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Politics is for the present, but an equation is for eternity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: All that is valuable in human society depends upon the opportunity for development accorded the individual.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: In matters of truth and justice, there is no difference between large and small problems, for issues concerning the treatment of people are all the same.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: No amount of experimentation can ever prove me right; a single experiment can prove me wrong.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The distinction between the past, present and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I live in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in the years of maturity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Technological progress is like an axe in the hands of a pathological criminal.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
